Identification of web service accounts o.Action: Ingest and correlate external threat intelligence feeds containing indicators (e.g., email addresses used for registration, associated IPs/domains) linked to known threat actor use of legitimate web services for resource development. Query intelligence platform for matches.

Network traffic from internal systems co.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections originating from internal systems to known malicious domains or IP addresses hosted on legitimate web services (e.g., GitHub, Google Drive, Pastebin) identified via threat intelligence. Analyze connection patterns, frequency, and payload characteristics (if available) using descriptive statistics and time series analysis to identify unusual communications.
